dcterms:creator: M.-W. Huang
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 2,560 clean speech utterances spoken by four male and four female speakers, recorded at a 16-kHz sampling rate. It was used to assess the proposed NIT-CycleGAN SE system.
dcterms:title: Taiwan Mandarin Hearing in Noise Test

dcterms:creator: J. Thiemann
N. Ito
E. Vincent
dcterms:description: A collection of multi-channel recordings of acoustic noise in diverse environments, used to generate noisy utterances for the evaluation of the proposed system.
dcterms:title: DEMAND
